title: JTAG port
extract: JTAG (named after the Joint Test Action Group which codified it) is an industry standard for verifying designs and testing printed circuit boards after manufacture. ... The Joint Test Action Group formed in 1985 to develop a method of verifying designs and testing printed circuit boards after manufacture.
extract_html: JTAG (named after the Joint Test Action Group which codified it) is an industry standard for verifying designs and testing printed circuit boards after manufacture. ... The Joint Test Action Group formed in 1985 to develop a method of verifying designs and testing printed circuit boards after manufacture.
